message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for $12,000. I believe this price reflects the value you would gain from the product, while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your product, $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to offer $10,500 for it. I believe this price reflects the value of the product to me while also allowing you a reasonable profit.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with $11,000 for the product. This price still allows us to maintain a good profit margin while being competitive in the market. I hope this proposal works for you.
